question: Which of the following defines JSON values that can be encoded into JSON strings according to the content of the document?
answers: `string`, `number`, `boolean`, `null`, maps with string keys and JSON values as values, arrays with JSON values
`string`, `integer`, `boolean`, `undefined`, maps with number keys and string values, arrays with mixed data types
`int`, `float`, `boolean`, objects with unordered keys, arrays with integer values only
`string`, `boolean`, `null`, objects with string keys and arrays with nested arrays
